author: Margaret Harding McGill, Ashley Gold, Sophia Cai
title: Washington steels for Russian cyber attacks
description: An escalating cyber conflict would field-test the preparations U.S. agencies have made in recent years.
content:
The Biden administration and Congress are steeling for cyber warfare from Russia following its invasion of Ukraine, and warning businesses to prepare for potential attacks.
